Html:
I'm new to this wrapper so my issue could be just ignorance. I have tried to register a task using various login types and I keep trapping an error with this message, "(15,19):UserId:1".

Does anyone know what this means? Thanks!

Darren
Are you mimicking the "Creating tasks..." samples here or here? That error usually is from an incorrectly formatted userId in the RegisterTaskDefinition method.
